title: ** Final Two OJs - Crooks (Omaha) and Hoover (Toronto) - now in Sterling Auctions!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: ** Final Two OJs - Crooks (Omaha) and Hoover (Toronto) - now in Sterling Auctions!
posts.post_content:
Crooks is in solid shape with a sharp photo and a tiny pinhole at the top.  Hoover is trimmed at the bottom but also has a very sharp photo.  Both are tougher players/poses/teams as well!

Asking $295 for Crooks and $195 for Hoover.  

Thanks in advance!
Brian
